title: Love Island's Sam Withers insists Phoebe and Cassie's lesbian romance is real
text:
Love Island Australia contestants Phoebe and Cassie shocked the nation after they decided to couple up during Monday night's episode.

And now, ousted contestant Sam Withers has insisted the pair's lesbian romance is definitely the real deal and he couldn't be happier for them.

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia on Monday, the 28-year-old DJ said: 'I'm absolutely stoked for Phoebe and Cassie.'

'It's definitely real!' Ousted Love Island contestant Sam Withers has insisted Phoebe (right) and Cassie's (left) lesbian romance is genuine

He continued: 'It's definitely real, because you can't really fake something like that. At the end of the day, love is love, and who are we to judge?'

Phoebe and Cassie's romance started to blossom after they shared a steamy kiss during a carnival game with their co-stars on Friday.

After the game ended, the pair met up again in the villa to discuss their feelings for each other.

Love story: Speaking to Daily Mail Australia on Monday, Sam Withers (pictured) said: 'you can't really fake something like that'

'People keep asking me about you and stuff and I said you are attractive and I want to get to know you,' Cassie confessed.

'I feel the same way,' said Phoebe. '100%, but I thought we are kind of in exactly the same boat because we both never had a relationship with a girl before.'

Following their passionate kiss, Phoebe than made the decision to couple up with Cassie on Monday night.

Before making the announcement, she explained: 'I want to couple up with this person because as soon as I walked into the villa I noticed them straight away.'

Start of something new: Phoebe and Cassie's romance started to blossom after they shared a steamy kiss during a carnival game with their co-stars

Will it last? Following their passionate kiss, Phoebe than made the decision to couple up with Cassie on Monday night

She continued: 'They've pretty much been the only person in the villa that I've had a sexual attraction too.'

'It took me by surprise but every time I talk to this person I feel like we have so much in common and nothing is ever awkward. So the person I'd like to couple-up with is Cassie,' she announced.

The episode also saw Sam Withers being voted out, as Cynthia Taylu had to choose between him and Maurice Salib.
description: Love Island Australia contestants Phoebe and Cassie shocked the nation after they decided to couple up during Monday night's episode.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
